user_query: I'm conducting research on the Unicode block 'basic_latin' and need detailed information about it. Can you provide me with the first and last codepoints of this block? Additionally, I want to search for cat videos on YouTube. Show me the top 10 cat videos sorted by relevance.

TaskList.description: Retrieve detailed information about the Unicode block 'basic_latin', including the first and last codepoints.
Search for cat videos on YouTube and retrieve the top 10 videos sorted by relevance.
